title: Critical Patch Update CPU
extract: The Oracle Critical Patch Update (CPU) is an ongoing series of regularly issued fixes for security flaws in products made by or maintained by software giant Oracle Corp. ... An analysis of the security vulnerabilities addressed in Oracle's CPUs and Security Alerts typically accompanies the patch releases.
extract_html: The Oracle Critical Patch Update (CPU) is an ongoing series of regularly issued fixes for security flaws in products made by or maintained by software giant Oracle Corp. ... An analysis of the security vulnerabilities addressed in Oracle's CPUs and Security Alerts typically accompanies the patch releases.
